name: Recipe: Abundance of Luck
description: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.
story:
A concise recipe detailing the ingredients and steps needed to make "Abundance of Luck." The recipe is simple, but every word is a testament condensed from the dedication of the drinksmiths.

"Best served cold with extra ice, and no additional sugar. Guarantees a perfect morning~"
